identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.

usage.h1: font-mono text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold tracking-tighter uppercase
usage.h2: font-mono text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold tracking-tight uppercase
usage.label: font-mono text-xs font-bold tracking-widest uppercase text-muted-foreground

rules: NO soft shadows. Use hard borders or very subtle ambient occlusion.
Contrast is key. Black on White. White on Black.

grid_systems.product_grid: grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-x-6 gap-y-10

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-12 px-8 rounded-none font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-sm transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-12 px-8 rounded-none font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-sm
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary bg-transparent hover:bg-primary hover:text-primary-foreground h-12 px-8 rounded-none font-mono uppercase tracking-wider text-sm

cards.product: group relative border border-border bg-card hover:border-primary transition-colors duration-300

inputs.default: h-12 rounded-none border-border bg-background px-4 font-sans focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-primary

badges.default: rounded-none border-transparent bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/80 font-mono uppercase text-[10px] tracking-widest px-2 py-1

assets.icons: Use lucide-react. Prefer technical icons: Settings, Wrench, Disc, Zap, Activity, Box, Grid, List.

home.strategy: Impactful Hero. Large typography. 'Spec-sheet' layout for featured items.
sections: Hero: Full width image with heavy overlay. H1 in JetBrains Mono.
Categories: Grid of 4 items. High contrast.
Featured Parts: Horizontal scroll or grid. Minimal cards.

browse.strategy: Utility first. Sidebar filters (sticky). Clean grid.

product_detail.strategy: Split screen. Left: Image (sticky). Right: Details (scroll).
product_detail.features: Big 'Add to Cart' button. Technical specs table.

admin.layout: Sidebar nav. Dashboard widgets in bento grid.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use rounded corners > 2px. This is a machine shop, not a candy store.
DO NOT use gradients. Flat colors only.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all numbers, prices, and technical specs.
Animations should be fast (0.2s) and linear or ease-out. No bouncy springs.
All interactive elements must have a hover state (underline, color invert, or border darken).
